org.kaaproject.kaa.client.channel.failover

Interface FailoverManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFailoverManager

    public interface FailoverManager
    Manager is responsible for managing current server's failover/connection events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FailoverDecision onFailover(FailoverStatus failoverStatus)
      Needs to be invoked to determine a decision that resolves the failover.
      void onServerChanged(TransportConnectionInfo connectionInfo)
      Needs to be invoked as soon as current server is changed.
      void onServerConnected(TransportConnectionInfo connectionInfo)
      Needs to be invoked as soon as connection to the current server is established.
      void onServerFailed(TransportConnectionInfo connectionInfo, FailoverStatus status)
      Needs to be invoked when a server fail occurs.
      void setFailoverStrategy(FailoverStrategy failoverStrategy) 

    • Method Detail

      • onServerFailed

        void onServerFailed(TransportConnectionInfo connectionInfo,
                    FailoverStatus status)
        Needs to be invoked when a server fail occurs.
        Parameters:
        connectionInfo - the connection information of the failed server.
        status - failover status
        See Also:
        TransportConnectionInfo

      • onServerChanged

        void onServerChanged(TransportConnectionInfo connectionInfo)
        Needs to be invoked as soon as current server is changed.
        Parameters:
        connectionInfo - the connection information of the newly connected server.
        See Also:
        TransportConnectionInfo

      • onServerConnected

        void onServerConnected(TransportConnectionInfo connectionInfo)
        Needs to be invoked as soon as connection to the current server is established.
        Parameters:
        connectionInfo - the connection information of the current server, to which connection was successfully established.
        See Also:
        TransportConnectionInfo

      • onFailover

        FailoverDecision onFailover(FailoverStatus failoverStatus)
        Needs to be invoked to determine a decision that resolves the failover.
        Parameters:
        failoverStatus - current status of the failover.
        Returns:
        decision which is meant to resolve the failover.
        See Also:
        FailoverDecision, FailoverStatus

      • setFailoverStrategy

        void setFailoverStrategy(FailoverStrategy failoverStrategy)
        Parameters:
        failoverStrategy - strategy that will be used to resolve failovers.
        See Also:
        FailoverStrategy
